Text: "If you think the fact that we have sold in excess of 2 million records and have never been paid a penny is pretty unbelievable, well, so do we. And the fact that EMI informed us that not only aren't they going to pay us AT ALL but that we are still 1.4 million dollars in debt to them is even crazier." -Jared Leto (lead singer 30StM)

Thanks for the quote, merethan, led me to an article that I would not have otherwise read.

And thanks uploader, for the quality work!
